page.title: 19APPLETON ROEBUCK SHOP
page.content: Only one shop is needed to serve the village as most people buy from super- markets in York.{The Post Office}is a general store & newsagents,a noticeboard for jobs,sales & wanted adverts and forthcoming events. It has a small number of customers and a limited turnover,so it cannot compete with big supermarkets but as it is the only shop and is bigger than the small shop at Bolton Percy it has a good trade in "last minute",or "run out of " groceries. It sells fruit,vegetables,bread,toys sweets.tights,medicines,ices,cards,tea soft drinks,tissues,laces,soap,meats, cottons,biscuits and cigarettes. The Post Office deals with pensions, posts,licences,benefits and banking. There are three jobs in the shop and a number of paper rounds.It opens week- days (notWed.pm) & Saturday morning.
